tr.td: In some cases, this test should be only exclusively with like tests (examples are cyto or pathology)

When D is specified for this field, using field OM1-49 determines how tests must be grouped together. Tests within the same Diagnostic Service Sector may be on the same requisition, and therefore in the same message
This test can be included with any number of other tests
Default -.will be assumed when this field is empty

description.value: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0919 ( Exclusive Test)

valueString.value: When D is specified for this field, using field OM1-49 determines how tests must be grouped together. Tests within the same Diagnostic Service Sector may be on the same requisition, and therefore in the same message

display.value: In some cases, this test should be only exclusively with like tests (examples are cyto or pathology)

valueString.value: Default -.will be assumed when this field is empty

display.value: This test can be included with any number of other tests
